description:
The Drawer mixin is intended for all components
that extend <k-drawer> It forwards the methods to
the <k-drawer> ref. Extending <k-drawer> directly
can lead to breaking methods when the methods are not
wired correctly to the right elements and refs.

props.name: tab
props.description: The name of the currently active tab

props.name: icon
props.description: The default icon for the drawer header

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID for the drawer

props.name: options
props.description: Option buttons for the drawer header

props.name: title
props.description: The default title for the drawer header
